page.title: 14Banking in South Bradford.
page.content: Our 'block' has a considerable amount of light industry and a population of approximately 40,000 and yet it is only served by{ 4 banks.}In fact one of these banks is situated on the Euroway Estate and serves business rather than the general public.Of the other 3 one is situated in the extreme NW corner of the 'block' and the 2 others are situated in square 7.There are{no building societies}in the whole 'block'.Therefore it can be seen that many people must not use a bank or they use a{central bank}in Bradford some distance away from where they live.However most of the{supermarkets are now able to{cash cheques}and there are several in the 'block'.Many chilren still take advantage of the {school banking system.
